name: INLINE TEST
description:
Complete the test by clearing every level. Your weapon is a lethal beam that forms along two charges. Place charges such that the beam passes through targets to destroy them.

INLINE TEST is a product of 5 weeks of messing around with C++ coding language. Primarily as a programming challenge and a learning opportunity, the game was built without a dedicated game engine. The project does, however, include external libraries, namely PixelGameEngine UI framework by OneLoneCoder, and cute_c2 Collision Detection framework by RandyGaul.

Please, feel free to leave your feedback. All criticism is welcome.
